cont.entity_a: Great sound quality with clean and separate acoustics. Well-balanced sound for the price, though lacks boomy bass. Excellent for gaming, music, and movies with a crisp sound.
cont.entity_b: Clear sound quality for TV, not ideal for music. Static interference and volume inconsistencies present.

cont.entity_a: Very comfortable fit, even for long periods, and suitable for people wearing glasses.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable but not suitable for exercise due to loose fit.

cont.entity_a: Durable over many years of use, though some plastic parts may crack.
cont.entity_b: Multiple reports of left earpiece failure and poor durability.

Design.comm: Open design leads to sound leakage.

cont.entity_a: Open-ear design not ideal for public or quiet environments. Long cable can be cumbersome but allows flexibility in movement.
cont.entity_b: Lacks noise cancellation and can leak sound. Not compatible with some modern TVs without additional equipment.

cont.entity_a: Adapter needed for 3.5 mm devices, included in the package. Modifications like removing foam can enhance bass performance.
cont.entity_b: Easy to operate with physical power switch and volume wheel. Requires manual tuning which can be challenging.
Loose fit, prone to falling off, especially when moving.
Good battery life with easy recharging on the cradle.
